name: First Person Frogger (FPF)
description:
First Person Frogger made by two DIT students.

Help Froggy get back to his home by crossing the busy road and toxic water.

Keyboard:

W,A,S,D - Main Movement

Q,E - To Turn

Z,C - To Strafe

Xbox 360 controller:

Left Stick To Move

Left and Right Bumpers To Turn
